Team Miracle is now in Atlanta!! We would love to have you join us on October 16th, 2015(Friday), at 11:30 AM EST as we start our journey at our new Center for Digital Transformation . Our team in Atlanta will be focussed on helping customers go through their Digital Transformation journey. We will be helping them with nextGen technologies, and thought leadership based on our 20 years of industry expertise and experience.
 
Please use the code M01ATL to RSVP yourself to the event, for which the details are below. This is an invite only event.
 
Venue : 6465 East Johns Crossing , Suit 315 Johns Creek GA 30097
Time : 11:30 AM EST
Date : October 16th, 2015(Friday)
